google_analytics.description: Measures how users visit and interact with the website.

google_ads.description: Tracks user behavior to show targeted advertisements.

doubleclick.description: Cross-site advertising and ad performance tracking platform.

facebook_pixel.description: Tracks user actions for personalized advertising on Facebook and Instagram.

linkedin_insight.description: Measures LinkedIn ad conversions and audience insights.

twitter_pixel.description: Tracks engagement and conversions for Twitter ads.

tiktok_pixel.description: Tracks user actions for TikTok advertising and profiling.

taboola.description: Recommends content and ads based on reading behavior.

outbrain.description: Tracks content engagement to suggest articles and ads.

hotjar.description: Records clicks, scrolling, and user interactions.

clarity.description: Analyzes how users interact with pages using session recordings.

cloudflare_analytics.description: Tracks website performance and traffic metrics.

segment.description: Collects and routes user data to multiple analytics platforms.

mixpanel.description: Tracks user actions and engagement events.

amplitude.description: Analyzes user behavior and product usage patterns.
